Material used.Description: Human cell lines were transfected with wild-type and Gly2385Arg LRRK2 constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: Gly2385Arg variant showed increased toxicity and higher apoptosis rates under oxidative stress compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not explicitly mentioned, but p-values were provided.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal protein expression levels under basal conditions.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significantly reduced cell viability under oxidative stress.

Approved assay.Description: This method is commonly used to study the effects of genetic variants in Parkinson's disease.
